text.div:
Pathology Reporting Individual Lipid Test

http://hl7.org.au/fhir/core/ValueSet/pathology-reporting-individual-lipid

The Pathology Reporting Individual Lipid Test value set includes values that can represent the individual measurement observations often included in a lipid panel. The values included align with the RCPA Standardised Pathology Informatics in Australia (SPIA) reporting guidelines.
